title: The Billionaire Who Phoned Me
description: Snatch up this rough & tumble episode in the exploits of one randy billionaire and the leggy blonde he feels he "owns." This is truly one twisted ride.When we last left Tristan and Lisa, he'd just duped her into a night of relatively gentle, passionate sex that they'd both enjoyed--although the side effects could change their lives forever. Now she's asked him home for the holidays, but will they be enjoying turkey around her family's table, or will Lisa's step-brother the cop be lurking around their backwoods family home to remind her how *close* they used to be?Out of the frying pan and into the fire, The Billionaire Who Phoned Me gets darker and more twisted in the latest installment of Lisa's sexy, sexy journey through life on the arm of the best-looking rich guy she's ever met--whether she likes him or not!
author: A. Violet End
